original_text:
I beat them fine as the dust of the earth;
    I crushed them and stamped them down like the mire of the streets.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 땅의 티끌 같이 부스러뜨리고 거리의 진흙 같이 밟아 헤쳤나이다

sentences.original_text: I beat them fine as the dust of the earth;
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 땅의 티끌같이 아주 곱게 쳤으니

sentences.original_text: and stamped them down like the mire of the streets.
